title: [SOLVED] 820-2936-B Chimes, backlight, no picture. (L9080 blown)
message:
So this laptop chimes, has a backlight and the caps key lights up when I tap it, but it never gives an picture. The screen is just black with the backlight on.

I have tried all the usual things like a PRM reset. The external screen doesn't seem to work either, but I am checking with a new HDMI cable tomorrow.

Can someone give some initial direction to get me started please?

title: [SOLVED] 820-2936-B Chimes, backlight, no picture. (L9080 blown)
message: First try a known good LCD assembly of course. Then check all LVDS lines on diode mode. Damaged L9080 is common.

title: [SOLVED] 820-2936-B Chimes, backlight, no picture. (L9080 blown)
message:
L9080 had broken trace.

Thanks again dukefawks.

Close and mark as solved please. (There's a type in the subject model number too, while you're editing. Will help others find it if it's right.)
